Html:
After loading the RegionsSpike solution, it won't build because the CX.Containers project is not configured to build in Config Manager - not sure if this is on purpose?

Once I get the project built, I get the following error:

MissingMethodException was unhandled
Method not found: 'Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer Castle.Windsor.IWindsorContainer.AddComponent()'

This error occurs at cxContainer.Register<IShell, Shell>(); in the RegisterViews() method...

Any thoughts?
(Yes, I have Castle Windsor installed)

Thanks,
Bob
